articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Attends Iranian Presidential Inaugural Ceremony
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Attends Iranian Presidential Inaugural Ceremony
						
 Tehran, August 4 (KCNA Correspondent) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, took part in the presidential inaugural ceremony of the Islamic Republic of Iran held at the building of the parliament on Sunday. 
					 Attending there were also state and government leaders of different countries, foreign guests and Iranian officials of different social standings. 
					
					 Iranian President Hassan Rouhani took his oath of office following the congratulatory speeches.
					
					Kim Yong Nam took part in the reception which was given in the name of the president.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Meets Syrian PM, High-ranking Officials of Iran, Cuba
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Meets Syrian PM, High-ranking Officials of Iran, Cuba
						
 Tehran, August 4 (KCNA Correspondent) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, who is on a visit to Iran to take part in the presidential inaugural ceremony of Iran, respectively met and had talks with Akbar Hashemi Rafsanjani, chairman of the Expediency Council of Iran, Wael Nader Al Halqi, prime minister of Syria, and Ricardo Cabrisas, viceÔºçpresident of the Council of Ministers of Cuba, on August 3 and 4.
					 Rafsanjani said the future of the DPRK is rosy thanks to the leadership of HE Kim Jong Un.
					
					 He expressed belief that the Korean people with staunch fighting spirit would emerge victorious in the anti-U.S. struggle.
					
					At the meeting the Syrian prime minister said Syria regards the DPRK as a military power with tremendous military force and a country of comrades-in-arms struggling against the common enemy.
					
					 He expressed profound thanks to the Korean people for supporting the struggle of the Syrian government and people.
					
					 Thanks to the wise leadership of supreme leader Kim Jong Un, the service personnel and people of the DPRK are resolutely foiling the U.S. moves to stifle it, he said.
					
					The Cuban vice-president said the relations between the DPRK and Cuba are the deeply-rooted ones which stood all sorts of tests of history.
					
					 The fraternal peoples of Cuba and the DPRK will dynamically advance toward victory, supporting and helping each other in the future, too, he added.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Leaves Tehran
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Leaves Tehran
 Tehran, August 5 (KCNA Correspondent) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, left Tehran on Monday after taking part in the presidential inaugural ceremony of the Islamic Republic of Iran at the invitation of the Iranian government.
					 Accompanying him were Pak Kil Yon, vice-minister of Foreign Affairs, and other suite members.
					
					 Kim Yong Nam and his party were seen off by officials of the Iranian Foreign Ministry, Jo In Chol, DPRK ambassador to Iran, and staff members of his embassy.

articles.title: Yang Hyong Sop Meets Lao Delegation
articles.content:
Yang Hyong Sop Meets Lao Delegation
						
 Pyongyang, August 5 (KCNA) -- Yang Hyong Sop, vice-president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, met and had a talk with the visiting delegation of the Central Committee of the National Construction Front of Laos led by Chairman Phandoaungchit Vongsa that paid a courtesy call on him at the Mansudae Assembly Hall Monday.

articles.title: Congratulations to Kim Jong Un from Russian Political Party Leader
articles.content:
Congratulations to Kim Jong Un from Russian Political Party Leader
 Pyongyang, August 5 (KCNA) -- First Secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea Kim Jong Un received a congratulatory message from S. M. Mironov, chairman of the A Just Russia, on July 24.
					 In the message Mironov, on his own behalf and on behalf of the A Just Russia, sent congratulations to Kim Jong Un and, through him, to all the Korean people on the 60th anniversary of the victory in the great Fatherland Liberation War. 
					
					 Noting that this historic event was of weighty significance in the DPRK, the message said the victory won by the Korean people in the struggle against the imperialist forces six decades ago was the most significant event of the meaningful anniversaries recorded in the modern history of the DPRK. 
					
					 It wished Kim Jong Un and all the citizens of the DPRK good health, happiness and big successes.
					
					 It expressed hope that the cooperation between the two countries and between the A Just Russia and the Workers' Party of Korea would favorably develop.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un Receives Message from Russian Party Leader
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Receives Message from Russian Party Leader
 Pyongyang, August 5 (KCNA) -- First Secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea Kim Jong Un received a message of greeting from Chairman of the Liberal Democratic Party of Russia V. V. Zhirinovsky on July 23.
					 The message said:
					
					 I extend congratulations to you and the friendly people of the DPRK on the 60th anniversary of the victory in the great 1950-1953 Fatherland Liberation War. 
					
					 The Korean people and the heroic Korean People's Army under the leadership of Generalissimo Kim Il Sung, a distinguished strategist and statesman, defeated the outnumbered aggressors and forced the enemies to sign the Korean Armistice Agreement. 
					
					 The Liberal Democratic Party of Russia has always supported the policy of the DPRK and will do so in the future, too. 
					
					 I am pleased that the DPRK has turned into an industrialized state of Asia with developed infrastructure, great scientific potential and effective higher educational system training talents in all the fields of national economy since the ceasefire. 
					
					 Noting that Zhirinovsky is joining Kim Jong Un in proudly greeting the 60th anniversary of the victory in the great 1950-1953 Fatherland Liberation War, the message wished him and all the Korean people happiness and prosperity. 
					
					 It expressed belief that the DPRK would successfully foil the political and military provocations of the hostile countries and the relations between Russia and the DPRK would remain traditional relations of friendship. 
					
					 It also hoped peace would settle on the Korean Peninsula.

articles.title: Message to Kim Jong Un from Chairman of C.C., Communist Party of Russian Federation
articles.content:
Message to Kim Jong Un from Chairman of C.C., Communist Party of Russian Federation
						
 Pyongyang, August 5 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, received a congratulatory message from G. Zhuganov, chairman of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of the Russian Federation, on July 22.
					 The message said:
					
					 60 years have passed since the Korean people won a victory in the Fatherland Liberation War.
					
					 The Korean people together with all foreign friends are celebrating this significant day.
					
					 The Korean People's Revolutionary Army founded under the leadership of Kim Il Sung, the outstanding leader of the Korean people, dealt a deadly blow at the enemy and achieved the liberation of the country.
					
					 In the course of the struggle for liberation the militant friendship between the peoples of our two countries deepened.
					
					 The Communist Party of the Russian Federation remains faithful to this friendship.
					
					 We, together with you, honor the memory of those who dedicated their lives to the independence of their country and congratulate the war veterans who witness the present reality provided by their militant victory.
					
					 After defeating the enemy, your country started a creative work for the rehabilitation of the national economy of the country.
					
					 Great changes took place in scientific, educational, cultural, industrial, agricultural and all other fields in a short span of time.
					
					 The Korean People's Army, a guarantee for the independence of the DPRK, has grown strong despite constant provocations of the outside hostile forces.
					
					 On this significant day, we once again remember the fighters who fought for the independence of your country.
					
					 We are convinced that the present younger generation of the DPRK will carry forward the sacred cause of their grandfathers and fathers.
					
					 The message wished Kim Jong Un, the Workers' Party of Korea and all the Korean people fresh success in socialist construction.

articles.title: Greetings to Kim Jong Un from Leader of Uruguayan March 26 Movement
articles.content:
Greetings to Kim Jong Un from Leader of Uruguayan March 26 Movement 
 Pyongyang, August 5 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK), received a message of greeting from Ruben Maria Vera, chairman of the March 26 Movement of Uruguay, on July 18.
					 The message extended congratulations to Kim Jong Un, the WPK and the Korean people on making an epoch-making success in the struggle against imperialism and for socialist construction on the occasion of the 60th anniversary of the victory in the Fatherland Liberation War fought against the aggression by the U.S. imperialists and their allies.
					
					 The Korean people won the war and set an example for the people and humankind to follow in building dignified, sovereign and independent new socialist Korea under the leadership of President Kim Il Sung, it noted.
					
					 The message wished Kim Jong Un, the WPK and the Korean people a fresh victory in socialist construction and in the efforts to reunify the country.
					
					 It extended fraternal and revolutionary salute to Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Gift to Kim Jong Un from C.C., NCFL
articles.content:
Gift to Kim Jong Un from C.C., NCFL
						
 Pyongyang, August 5 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un received a gift from the Central Committee of the National Construction Front of Laos (NCFL).
					 The gift was handed to Yang Hyong Sop, vice-president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly, on Monday by Chairman Phandoaungchit Vongsa who is leading the visiting delegation of the C.C., NCFL.

articles.title: Foreign Guests Leave
articles.content:
Foreign Guests Leave 
 Pyongyang, August 5 (KCNA) -- The delegation of the Central Committee of the National Construction Front of Laos led by Chairman Phandoaungchit Vongsa went back home Monday.
					 Vishwanath, secretary general of the International Kim Il Sung Prize Council and the International Kim Jong Il Prize Council and director general of the International Institute of the Juche Idea, and Harish Gupta, director general of the Asian Regional Institute of the Juche Idea, left here on the same day.
					
					 Departing here earlier were Henry Masiko, director general of the African Regional Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea, and his party.

articles.title: Committee of ASEAN Here Hosts Reception
articles.content:
Committee of ASEAN Here Hosts Reception
						
 Pyongyang, August 5 (KCNA) -- The Committee of the Association of Southeast Asian Nations (ASEAN) in the DPRK Monday hosted a reception on the occasion of the 46th anniversary of the ASEAN.
					 Present there on invitation were Pak Ui Chun, foreign minister, and officials of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs.
					
					 Present there were Ilham Tuah Bin Illias, Malaysian charge d' affaires ai, Chhorn Hay, Cambodian ambassador, Le Quang Ba, Vietnamese ambassador, Nasri Gustaman, Indonesian ambassador, and staff members of foreign embassies here.
					
					 Speeches were made there.

articles.title: DPRK Cabinet Hosts Reception for Successful Taekwon-Do Team
articles.content:
DPRK Cabinet Hosts Reception for Successful Taekwon-Do Team
						
 Pyongyang, August 5 (KCNA) -- The Cabinet of the DPRK hosted a reception at Okryu Restaurant on Sunday for the players who proved successful at the 18th World Taekwon-Do Championship.
					 Kim Yong Jin, vice-premier of the Cabinet, made a speech at the reception.
					
					 He said their successes added to the festive atmosphere throughout the country celebrating the 60th anniversary of the victory in the Fatherland Liberation War and instilled strength and courage into all the service personnel and people.
					
					 It was thanks to the wise leadership of supreme leader Kim Jong Un that they could register such successes at the championship, he added.
					
					 He called on the players and coaches to make redoubled efforts to attain the higher goal in their training.
					
					  Player Han Song Min in his reply said that Marshal Kim Jong Un showed all kinds of love and trust for all the sportspersons in the DPRK
					
					 He pledged to make greater successes in every game by meeting the requirements of the ideological, persevering, speed and technical campaigns set forth by the Workers' Party of Korea.

articles.title: Songdowon Int'l Children's Camping Starts
articles.content:
Songdowon Int'l Children's Camping Starts
						
 Pyongyang, August 5 (KCNA) -- A ceremony of receiving the 28th batch of campers at the Songdowon International Children's Camp took place on Monday.
					 Present there were Jong Yong Won, vice-chairman of the C.C., the youth league, Chae Il Ryong, vice-chairman of the Kangwon Provincial People's Committee, officials concerned and campers' groups of the DPRK, China, Russia, Mongolia, Vietnam and France.
					
					 Participants laid floral baskets and bouquets before the statue of Generalissimo Kim Il Sung at the camp before paying tribute to him. 
					
					 The flag of camping was hoisted.
					
					 The ceremony started with "Song of International Friendship Camping". A congratulatory address, a report and speeches were made there.
					
					 Then followed a march-past of the campers.
					
					 During the camping the campers will train their bodies and minds and deepen friendship while spending pleasant days through various activities like marine sports and amusement games and celebration of national days of those countries.

articles.title: Nano-technology Exhibition Held in DPRK
articles.content:
Nano-technology Exhibition Held in DPRK
						
 Pyongyang, August 5 (KCNA) -- The 10th national sci-tech presentation and show in the field of nano-technology took place here from July 30 to August 2.
					 Attending the presentation and show were more than 20 units, including the State Academy of Sciences. 130 odd scientific papers were presented and at least 1 000 pieces of products in 260 kinds, among them nano-science and technology books, exhibited in the form of object, model and chart.
					
					 The products included nano germicide, nano photosynthetic accelerant and nano microelement compound invented by the Agricultural Nano Technology Institute under the Academy of Agricultural Science, which have been applied to hundreds of thousands of hectares of farmlands in several years to prove effective.
					
					 Nano combined antibacterial agent, nano water-purifying agent and functional nano toothbrush, produced by the Okryu Foodstuff-processing Company under the General Bureau of Public Service, drew the attention of visitors. There were also such nano health drinks, made with natural surface active agent, as nano gold and silver spring waters and nano gold and silver liquors.
					
					 Nano gold liquor helps preserve health and treat different diseases.
					
					 Nano garments, presented by the Myonghung High-tech Materials Company, have functions of antibiosis, destruction of organic matter and prevention of ultraviolet rays.
					
					 The Taedonggang Technology Company displayed carbon nano pipe and chart showing its production process.
					
					 Pyongyang Medical College of Kim Il Sung University presented nano platinum injection, nano compound plastic denture material and Saengdangssuk injection.
					
					 Besides, scientific institutes and educational establishments presented atomic force microscope, X-ray diffraction analyzer, scanning tunneling microscope and other products used in the field of nano measurement.
					
					 Achievements and experiences, gained in the field of nano technology were exchanged at the presentation and show.

articles.title: World Hepatitis Day Observed in DPRK
articles.content:
World Hepatitis Day Observed in DPRK
						
 Pyongyang, August 5 (KCNA) -- An event took place at the Grand People's Study House in the DPRK Monday to observe the World Hepatitis Day.
					 Present there were officials of public health and media.
					
					 Also present there were the representative and staff members of the WHO and deputy representative of UNICEF here.
					
					 An opening address, congratulatory speech and speeches on experience were made.
					
					 The participants watched scientific film "Let's Prevent Hepatitis B".

articles.title: Event on World Breastfeeding Week Held
articles.content:
Event on World Breastfeeding Week Held 
 Pyongyang, August 5 (KCNA) -- An event took place in Nampho Monday to mark the beginning of the World Breastfeeding Week.
					 Present there were officials of the Ministry of Public Health, provinces, cities and counties, officials concerned, nursing mothers, representative of the WHO and staff members of the mission of UNICEF here.
					
					 An opening address and congratulatory speeches were made at the event.
					
					 The speakers referred to the successes and experience gained in breastfeeding.
					
					 They underscored the need to make efforts to raise healthy babies by paying greater public attention to breastfeeding. 
					
					 Then, the participants watched a video. Discussions were made on "Breastfeeding in the DPRK" and "Posture and method of putting a baby to a breast".
					
					 The participants went round photos on information service for promoting breastfeeding and enjoyed an art performance given by children.

articles.title: Officials' Swimming Contest Starts
articles.content:
Officials' Swimming Contest Starts
						
 Pyongyang, August 5 (KCNA) -- There commenced a swimming contest among officials of the commissions, ministries and national institutions at the swimming pool of the Changgwang Health Complex. July and August are months for maritime sports in the DPRK.
					 The contest brought together hundreds of officials.
					
					 They were divided into five groups and will compete in team event and individual event. 
					
					 The players of Group A and Group B had a competition on Monday. It goes on.

articles.title: Leader Kim Jong Il's Deep Concern Shown for S. Korean Businessman
articles.content:
Leader Kim Jong Il's Deep Concern Shown for S. Korean Businessman
						
 Pyongyang, August 5 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, supreme leader of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea, sent a verbal message in memory of Jong Mong Hon, ex-chairman of south Korea's Hyundai Group, on the occasion of the 10th anniversary of his death.
					 Jong, a businessman, turned over a new leaf in his life for national reunification, overcome by the strong patriotic will and loving care of leader Kim Jong Il, who put the nation above anything else and subordinated everything to its interests. 
					
					 It was in October Juche 88 (1999) that he, together with Jong Ju Yong, honorary chairman of Hyundai Group, came to Pyongyang to be honored with the audience of Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Kim Jong Il showed deep care for Jong Mong Hon, who set it as a strategy of his business to cooperate with the DPRK, and took all possible steps for his business activities.
					
					 As was busy with state affairs, he again met Jong who came to Pyongyang after the North-South Summit in June 2000, and expressed belief that Jong would make positive contribution to the work for national unity and reconciliation and exchange and cooperation between the north and the south.
					
					 He also made time to visit a wharf at Kosong Port and Hotel built in the area of Mt. Kumgang, appreciating Jong's contribution to the implementation of the North-South Joint Declaration.
					
					 He posed for photo with Jong, calling him a pioneer of the economic cooperation between the north and the south, including tourism of Mt. Kumgang and construction of Kaesong Industrial Zone (KIZ).
					
					 When Jong died suddenly, leader Kim Jong Il expressed deep regret over his death and sent a message of condolences to Jong's wife.
					
					 Later, Kim Jong Il sent gifts to Jong's family members and relatives when they visited Pyongyang to attend the opening ceremony of the Ryugyong Jong Ju Yong Gymnasium.

articles.title: High-tech Cutting Tools Developed in DPRK
articles.content:
High-tech Cutting Tools Developed in DPRK
						
 Pyongyang, August 5 (KCNA) -- The Pyongyang Cermet Tools Development Company has developed high-tech cutting tools for CNC machines and machining centre.
					 Among them are S16MSSKCR09, S16MSCLCR09, PCGNR2525M12, PDLNL2525M12 and PSKNR2525M12, collapsible bites. They can be fixed as screw or lever.
					
					 Jon Kwang Guk, deputy head of the company, told KCNA that those tools are better than other kinds as they help raise the production of goods twice per hour while ensuring precision processing.
					
					 They, strong in wear and corrosion resistance, have won the national quality authentication, meeting the requirements of international standardization, he added.

articles.title: Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Work Observed
articles.content:
Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Work Observed
						
 Pyongyang, August 5 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun Monday dedicates an article to the 16th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's work "Let Us Carry Out the Great Leader Comrade Kim Il Sung's Instructions for National Reunification" published on August 4, Juche 86 (1997).
					 Kim Jong Il in the work comprehensively clarifies all the issues arising in achieving the country's reunification and formulates as the Three Charters for National Reunification the three principles of national reunification for independence, peaceful reunification and great national unity, the 10-point programme for the great unity of the whole nation and the proposal for founding the Democratic Federal Republic of Koryo proposed by President Kim Il Sung.
					
					 The article says:
					
					 The work serves as an immortal reunification programme which reflects the unwavering faith and will of Kim Jong Il to thoroughly carry forward the cause of the country's reunification started and led by Kim Il Sung, surely realize his lifetime desire and hand the reunified country to all the Koreans.
					
					 The validity and vitality of the work were fully demonstrated through the efforts of the Korean people to achieve the country's reunification over the last 16 years.
					
					 All the Koreans aspiring after patriotism are firmly united under the banner of national independence, the movement for the country's reunification has developed into a nation-wide one involving the north, the south and abroad and a massive one grouping the people from all walks of life irrespective of ideology, political view and affiliation, the historic June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration were published and events unprecedented in the history of the inter-Korean relations took place. These facts go to clearly prove the validity and vitality of the work.
					
					 The work serves as a great banner encouraging all the Koreans to the nation-wide struggle for frustrating the anti-DPRK provocations of outside forces and their stooges by the concerted efforts of the nation and implementing the last instructions of the peerlessly great men for the country's reunification.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Discloses Conspiracy between U.S., Japan
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Discloses Conspiracy between U.S., Japan
						
 Pyongyang, August 5 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun Monday in an article discloses the criminal nature of conspiracy made by the U.S. and Japanese invaders under the hypocritical signboard of "preservation of peace" in the 20th century.
					 The article says:
					
					 It was in the 19th century that the U.S. imperialists directed the spearhead of overseas invasion to the Asia-Pacific region.
					
					 They sustained repeated setbacks in their aggression on Korea which was kicked off with their intrusion of warship General Sherman. They abandoned their plan for lone-wolf invasion and sought an "ally" for carrying it out. Japan was fit for this alliance.
					
					 The "Taft-Katsura Treaty" fabricated by the U.S. and Japan in 1905 was no more than a product of criminal conspiracy between brazen-faced gangsters. The U.S. imperialists who helped the Japanese imperialists cook up the "Ulsa (1905) Five-point Treaty" turned their faces away from the resistance of the Korean people against the treaty but zealously patronized the Japanese imperialists' colonial rule over Korea.
					
					 It was none other than the U.S. which withdrew its legation from Korea before any other countries, claiming that the diplomatic right of Korea was transferred to Japan.
					
					 The Korean War in the 1950s was a scenario worked out by the U.S. in the early period of its occupation of south Korea to turn the Korean Peninsula into a bridgehead for invading the continent. Japan, which was revived and rearmed with the strong backing of the U.S. after the Second World War, regarded the war as a golden opportunity and actively participated in it.
					
					 The U.S. singled out the Asia-Pacific region as the pivot of its military strategy, noisily talking about "Pacific state" and "guarantee of security." It expects its satellite countries, Japan, in particular, to play a pivotal role in carrying out its strategy.
					
					 The Japanese militarists are keen to realize their long-pursued wild ambition for reinvasion at any cost, zealously pursuant to the U.S. policy of aggression. Japan is now working hard to modify its "defense programme guidelines" in line with the new defense strategy of the U.S.
					
					 Due to the U.S. policy of aggression and war and Japan's policy toeing it, the Korean Peninsula has been pushed to the brink of a nuclear war.
					
					 The aggressors should bear in mind this land is no longer the distress-torn land in the past when it was subject to the saber-rattling of big powers.

articles.title: Action Program of Grand March Group for Reunification Published
articles.content:
Action Program of Grand March Group for Reunification Published 
						
 Pyongyang, August 5 (KCNA) -- The south Korean Federation of University Students held a meeting outside the U.S. embassy in Seoul on Aug. 2 to inaugurate a grand march group for reunification and announced its action program.
					 The speakers at the meeting accused the ruling forces of blocking the state investigation probing the truth about the Intelligence Service's interference in the election, declaring that they would not stop their actions to punish those involved in the case.
					
					 The present regime escalated the danger of war by staging the Key Resolve and Foal Eagle joint military exercises in collusion with the U.S. and is now keen to bring the danger of war to this land through the projected Ulji Freedom Guardian joint military exercises, they charged.
					
					 They declared the students would actively stage actions for peace against imperialism.
					
					 The group will conduct an all-people signature campaign and a movement for defending peace in Taejon, Taegu, Pusan, Kwangju and other places in protest against the IS's interference in the election till August 15, they noted.
					
					 At the end of the meeting they staged information activities against Ulji Freedom Guardian.

articles.title: Japan's Reparation to A-bomb Victims Demanded in S. Korea
articles.content:
Japan's Reparation to A-bomb Victims Demanded in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, August 5 (KCNA) -- The Solidarity Association for Enforcement of Special Law for A-bomb Victims and Their Children in south Korea held a press conference outside the building of the Japanese embassy in Seoul on August 1 urging the Japanese government to make reparation to the A-bomb victims.
					 A lot of Koreans were killed by the A-bombs dropped by the U.S. in Japan in August, 1945. Most of those who narrowly escaped death at that time have already died.
					
					 Worse still, the descendants of the victims are suffering from aftermath of the bombings including various diseases and disorder.
					
					 The speakers at the conference recalled that open questionnaires were sent to the Japanese government on March 4 in demand of correct fact-finding survey of the victims and its apology and reparation to them but it evaded its responsibility, refusing to send a reply to them.
					
					 They urged the government of Japan, a war criminal state, to immediately make an apology and reparation to the victims.
					
					 They, at the same time, urged the U.S. and the Japanese government to fully open to public all the data related to the truth about the damage done by the A-bombs.
					
					 The organization demanded the present south Korean authorities institute a special law on the A-bomb victims and their second and third generations and adopt a "government" resolution for settling the problem.

articles.title: DPRK's War Victory Day Observed in Osaka
articles.content:
DPRK's War Victory Day Observed in Osaka 
 Pyongyang, August 5 (KCNA) -- A seminar of Koreans in Osaka celebrating the 60th anniversary of the victory in the Fatherland Liberation War took place on July 25 under the sponsorship of the Osaka Prefectural Headquarters of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon). 
					 Present there were Pu Yong Uk, chairman of the headquarters, and officials and other Koreans. 
					
					 Professor Ri Yong Su of Korea University made a report titled "On meaning of July 27 war victory and DPRK-U.S. all-out standoff". 
					
					 He said the victory in the Fatherland Liberation War was a historic event as it protected the sovereignty of the DPRK and nation. 
					
					 The national division continues in the Korean Peninsula and it is technically at war due to the U.S., he said, and went on:
					
					 The DPRK-U.S. all-out standoff is a historical struggle to put an end to the history of national distress caused by the imperialist powers, fully put into practice the idea of building a thriving socialist nation and build an independent world. 
					
					 Then followed speeches. 
					
					 Speakers denounced the U.S. for posing nuclear threat and blackmail against the DPRK while staging joint military drills. 
					
					 The U.S. should roll back its hostile policy towards the DPRK and come out for concluding a peace treaty, they said, adding:
					
					 The DPRK's new strategic line of simultaneously pushing forward economic construction and the building of nuclear force is a realistic one as it ensures a maximum effect in the effort for developing the economy of the country and bolstering up national defence capability as required by the actual situation in Korea.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Work Published in Russia
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Work Published in Russia
						
 Pyongyang, August 5 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un's work "The Great Kim Il Sung Is the Eternal Leader of Our Party and People" was published in booklet by the Reportsentr A Azin  Publishing House of Irkutsk Region of Russia on July 21.
					 The work, published on April 20, Juche 101 (2012), clarifies the revolutionary exploits President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il performed all their lives.
					
					 It indicates tasks to firmly defend and preserve the ideas and exploits of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il and eternally glorify them.

articles.title: Korean People's War Victory Day Marked Abroad
articles.content:
Korean People's War Victory Day Marked Abroad
						
 Pyongyang, August 5 (KCNA) -- Special write-ups were posted on websites of different countries on July 25 on the occasion of the 60th anniversary of the victory of the Korean people in the Fatherland Liberation War.
					 An article illustrated with photos of President Kim Il Sung was posted on the Brazilian website Marsha Berde.
					
					 It said:
					
					 The President shared joy and sorrow with the service personnel and people and led the war to victory with his rare military wisdom, outstanding strategies and tactics and deep trust and love.
					
					 The three-year Korean war was a fierce political and military confrontation between the young DPRK and the U.S. imperialists who boasted of their long history of aggression and numerical and technical superiority.
					
					 The President called on the entire party and army and all the people to turn out in the sacred war for making a clean sweep of the U.S. imperialists and their stooges from Korea.
					
					 In the whole period of the war he led the army and people to victory, making endless journeys from the supreme command to the front and from it to the rear. 
					
					 The brilliant victory in the war was a great victory of his outstanding military idea, strategies and tactics and ardent love for the people.
					
					 The France-Korea Friendship Association said in its website that July 27 is a significant day that the Korean people won the historic victory in the war ignited by the U.S. imperialists.
					
					 An article posted on an Italian internet magazine said that the armies and the peoples of Korea and China fought shoulder to shoulder against the U.S. imperialists and defeated them during the Korean war.

articles.title: Anniversary of Korean People's Victory in War Observed by Russian Paper
articles.content:
Anniversary of Korean People's Victory in War Observed by Russian Paper
						
 Pyongyang, August 5 (KCNA) -- The Russian paper Patriot No. 28 allotted its 16 papers to a special write-up on the occasion of the 60th anniversary of the Korean people's victory in the Fatherland Liberation War.
					 The paper carried a preface of its editorial board in the center of its first page under the title "Such people are invincible" illustrated with a photo of President Kim Il Sung standing at the tribune of honor of the Pyongyang mass rally celebrating the victory in the war.
					
					 The paper dedicated an article to Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il and Kim Jong Un, the great leaders recognized by the whole world, on the occasion of the 60th anniversary of the Korean people's victory in the war.
					
					 The paper said:
					
					 This special issue is not a mere manifestation of respect for the glorious and significant anniversary in the life of the Korean people.
					
					 Socialist Korea is standing as a firm and eternal bulwark and citadel and serves as a foundation of freedom, independence, and honesty and morality, social truth.
					
					 The DPRK is becoming a pride of not only the Korean nation but also of all progressives on this planet and shedding its rays as a star of great victory.
					
					 We are, therefore, following the successes achieved by the Korean people in the building of a thriving nation with respect, solidarity and hope and dedicate this special issue to the 60th anniversary of the great victory in the war, sincerely congratulating our most reliable friends.
					
					 The paper carried a poem titled "The ray of the great victory" together with portraits of smiling Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il and a portrait of Marshal Kim Jong Un on its second page.
					
					 It devoted its 8th, 9th, 12th, 13th and 15th pages to giving a detailed account of the greatness of the peerlessly great men and popular heroism of the Korean people accompanied by photos dealing with their exploits. 
					
					 It allotted its 6th, 7th, 10th, 11th and 16th pages to photos of service personnel advancing southward, photos showing the defeat of the U.S. imperialists and articles titled "1950-1953 Fatherland Liberation War which should not be forgotten and is unforgettable", "War and its outcome" and "Deserved end of the aggressors".

articles.title: Guinean Social Bodies Issue Bulletin to Mark DPRK's V-Day
articles.content:
Guinean Social Bodies Issue Bulletin to Mark DPRK's V-Day
 Pyongyang, August 5 (KCNA) -- The Guinean preparatory committee to mark the 60th anniversary of the victory of the Korean people in the great Fatherland Liberation War and the Guinean National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea jointly issued a special bulletin on July 26, a day before the anniversary.
					 The bulletin in an article titled "Generalissimo Kim Il Sung" said as follows:
					
					 Kim Il Sung waged a great war with the Japanese imperialists to defeat them and liberate the country.
					
					 He repulsed the U.S. imperialist invaders, who boasted of being "the strongest" in the world, with his outstanding strategy and tactics and original commanding arts to demonstrate the sovereignty and dignity of the country.
					
					 He turned his country into an invincible socialist power by leading the fierce confrontation with the U.S. imperialists to victory in the postwar period, too.
					
					 His undying military feats will go down in the world history of the struggle against imperialism.
					
					 It in an article titled "Peerless strategist" praised the feats the President, an invincible and iron-willed commander and military genius, performed by leading the war to victory.

articles.title: Anniversary of Korean People's Victory in War Observed in Foreign Countries
articles.content:
Anniversary of Korean People's Victory in War Observed in Foreign Countries 
 Pyongyang, August 5 (KCNA) -- A meeting, seminar, lecture and film show took place in Uganda, Guinea and Tunisia from July 25 to 27 on the occasion of the 60th anniversary of the Korean people's victory in the Fatherland Liberation War.
					 Present there were figures and other people of different social standings in those countries.
					
					 Leading members of the Ugandan National Resistance Movement and other people lauded President Kim Il Sung as an outstanding strategist and invincible and iron-willed commander, adding that the historic victory of the Korean people in the Fatherland Liberation War would have been unthinkable without the leadership of the President.
					
					 The chairman of the Ugandan National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea said at a seminar that the feats the President performed by defeating two imperialisms in one generation will go down in human history.
					
					 The Korean people led by him reliably protected the sovereignty and dignity of the country from the imperialists' ceaseless moves to stifle the DPRK, greatly encouraging the people of Uganda, he said, adding:
					
					 We will make positive efforts to study hard the principles of the Juche idea, Songun idea, and apply them to actual conditions.
					
					 The commander of the first commando force of the Almami Samori Toure barracks of the Guinean Army, after watching "The U.S. Imperialist Aggressors Provoked the Korean War", part 1 of the Korean documentary "The Fatherland Liberation War", said that the victory of the DPRK in the war was the shining fruition of the brilliant strategy and tactics, original war methods and superb commanding arts of the President.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam se reune con nuevo presidente irani
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam se reune con nuevo presidente irani
						
Pyongyang, 5 de agosto (ACNC) -- Kim Yong Nam, presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, realizo el dia 3 una visita de cortesia a Hassan Rouhani, presidente de la Republica Islamica de Iran.
					El visitante transmitio al nuevo mandatario el saludo enviado por el Mariscal Kim Jong Un.
					
					Hassan Rouhani expreso profundo agradecimiento y pidio al visitante que extendiera al Mariscal su sincero saludo.
					
					Recordo con profunda emocion que tuvo el honor de reunirse con el Generalisimo Kim Il Sung hace 30 anos.
					
					Aseguro que seguiran ampliandose y desarrollandose las relaciones de amistad y cooperacion entre la Republica Islamica de Iran y la RPDC.
					
					Las conversaciones transcurrieron en un ambiente amistoso.
					
					Estuvieron presentes en la ocasion el vicecanciller Pak Kil Yon, el embajador coreano en Iran, Jo In Chol, y otros acompanantes por la parte coreana y por la irani, el canciller Ali Akbar Salehi y otras personalidades interesadas.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam departe con personalidades de Siria, Iran y Cuba
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam departe con personalidades de Siria, Iran y Cuba
						
Teheran, 4 de agosto (Corresponsal de ACNC) -- El presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea Kim Yong Nam, quien realiza ahora una visita a la Republica Islamica de Iran para participar en la ceremonia de toma de posesion de presidente de este pais, departio los dias 3 y 4 por separado con el presidente del Consejo Estatal de Bienestar de Iran, Akbar Hashemi Rafsanjani, el primer ministro del gabinete de la Republica Arabe de Siria, Wael Nader Al Halqi y el vicepresidente del Comite Ejecutivo del Consejo de Ministros de Cuba, Ricardo Cabrisas.
					En la ocasion el premier sirio dijo que su pais considera la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea como potencia militar con inagotable poderio militar y companero de armas que lucha contra el enemigo comun.
					
					Expreso profundo agradecimiento al pueblo coreano que brindo apoyo y solidaridad a la lucha del gobierno y pueblo de Siria.
					
					Gracias a la sabia orientacion del Su Excelencia Kim Jong Un, el ejercito y pueblo  de Corea rechazan rotundamente las maniobras de EE.UU. para atropellar a la RPDC, apunto.
					
					El presidente del Consejo Estatal de Bienestar de Iran enfatizo que gracias a Su Excelencia Kim Jong Un, es prometedor el futuro de la RPDC, y expuso la conviccion de que el pueblo coreano con temperamento tenaz triunfara en la lucha antiyanqui. 
					
					El funcionario cubano dijo que las estrechas relaciones entre Cuba y Corea superaron las pruebas de toda indole de la historia, y agrego que los pueblos hermanos de Cuba y Corea  marcharan a pasos firmes por la victoria apoyando mutuamente en el futuro tambien.

articles.title: Iniciado campismo infantil en Songdowon
articles.content:
Iniciado campismo infantil en Songdowon
Pyongyang, 5 de agosto (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar el dia 5 la 28a ceremonia de ingreso en el Campamento Internacional de Ninos de Songdowon.
					Estuvieron presentes en el acto el vicepresidente del Comite Central de la Union de la Juventud Socialista Kim Il Sung, Jong Yong Won, el vicepresidente del Comite Popular de la Provincia de Kangwon, Chae Il Ryong, los funcionarios correspondientes y los grupos de campistas de Corea, China, Rusia, Mongolia, Vietnam y Francia. 
					
					Los participantes rindieron sublime homenaje al Generalisimo Kim Il Sung tras depositar cestos y ramos de flores ante su estatua de bronce erguida en el campamento.
					
					La ceremonia inicio con la interpretacion de la "cancion de campismo internacional de amistad".
					
					En la ocasion hubo discursos de felicitacion, informe e intervenciones. 
					
					Durante el periodo de campismo, los ninos se forjaran fisica y mentalmente y estrecharan el sentimiento de amistad realizando divertidas actividades extraescolares como deportes nauticos, juegos recreativos y celebracion del dia nacional.

articles.title: Acto por semana mundial de amamantamiento
articles.content:
Acto por semana mundial de amamantamiento
						
Pyongyang, 5 de agosto (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar el dia 5 en la ciudad de Nampho el acto por la semana mundial de amamantamiento.
					En la ocasion participaron los funcionarios del Ministerio de Salud Publica, los funcionarios sanitarios de las provincias, ciudades y distritos y los otros interesados, asi como madres lactantes, el representante de la Organizacion Mundial de la Salud (OMS) y los miembros de la representacion del Fondo de las Naciones Unidas para la Infancia (UNICEF) en Corea.
					
					En la ocasion hubo discurso inaugural y palabra de felicitacion.
					
					Los oradores se refirieron a los exitos y las experiencias logrados en la lactancia.
					
					Subrayaron que se debe esforzarse por criar sanamente a los bebes elevando la atencion social a la lactancia.
					
					Tambien hubo la vista de un video y debates sobre los temas tales como "Actividades de nutricion lactante de las madres en la RPDC", "La postura y los metodos de amamantar", etc.
					
					Los participantes vieron las fotos que dan a conocer las actividades de propaganda para promover el amamantamiento y presenciaron la funcion artistica infantil.

articles.title: Clausurada exposicion de nano-tecnologias
articles.content:
Clausurada exposicion de nano-tecnologias
						
Pyongyang, 5 de agosto (ACNC) -- En la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea tuvo lugar del 30 de julio al 2 de agosto la decima presentacion y exposicion nacional de ciencia  y tecnologia en la rama de nano-tecnologia con la participacion de mas de 20 unidades inclusive la Academia Estatal de Ciencias.
					En la cita fueron presentadas mas de 130 tesis de la rama y exhibidos los libros y productos de mas de 260 generos en forma de objetos reales, maquetas y esquema.
					
					El Instituto de Nano-tecnologias Agricolas, adscrito a la Academia de Ciencia Agricola presento esterilizantes y otros productos que se aplicaron en las faenas agricolas mostrando gran eficacia economica.
					
					Ademas, se exhibian diversas bebidas salubres que tratan las enfermedades y los productos de revestimiento que cumplen la funcion de disolucion de materias organicas e interrupcion de rayos ultravioletas.
					
					La Compania de Tecnicas Taedonggang presento el esquema y los articulos relacionados que demuestran el proceso de produccion industrial de nano-tubo carbonico, que se puede decir simbolo de nano-materias.
					
					El Instituto Superior de Medicina de Pyongyang, adscrito a la Universidad Kim Il Sung, expuso varias inyecciones, las cuales atrajeron la atencion en la rama de salud publica.
					
					En la exposicion se intercambiaron los exitos y experiencias logrados en el desarrollo de nano-tecnologias.
